## EditorApi.setReadOnly() method

Set whether the editor is read only or the user can edit the editor's value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setReadOnly(readOnly: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type |
|  --- | --- |
|  readOnly | boolean |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
